CreateTable.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwdoris.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTable
<common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwdoris-lrqz7cd4",
    "DbName": "demo",
    "TableName": "test",
    "KeysType": "AGG_KEY",
    "Columns": [
        {
            "Name": "user_id",
            "Type": "LARGEINT",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": true,
            "Comment": "用户id"
        },
        {
            "Name": "date",
            "Type": "DATE",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": true,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "数据灌入日期时间"
        },
        {
            "Name": "city",
            "Type": "VARCHAR(20)",
            "IsNull": true,
            "IsKey": true,
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "用户所在城市"
        },
        {
            "Name": "last_visit_date",
            "Type": "DATETIME",
            "AggType": "REPLACE",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": false,
            "DefaultValue": "1970-01-01 00:00:00",
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "用户最后一次访问时间"
        },
        {
            "Name": "cost",
            "Type": "BIGINT",
            "AggType": "SUM",
            "IsNull": false,
            "IsKey": false,
            "DefaultValue": "0",
            "IsPartition": false,
            "IsDistribution": false,
            "Comment": "用户总消费"
        }
    ],
    "Distribution": {
        "DistributionType": "Hash",
        "Count": 3
    },
    "Partition": {
        "PartitionType": "Range",
        "AutoPartition": false,
        "RangeInfos": [
            {
                "RangeType": "LESS THAN",
                "PartitionName": "p201701",
                "Max": "(\"2017-02-01\")"
            },
            {
                "RangeType": "FIXED",
                "PartitionName": "a202",
                "Left": "(\"2017-02-02\")",
                "Right": "(\"2017-03-01\")"
            }
        ]
    },
    "TableComment": "example",
    "Properties": [
        {
            "PropertyKey": "replication_allocation",
            "PropertyValue": "tag.location.default: 1"
        }
    ]
}
CreateTable.title: 建表-聚合模型

DescribeCreateTablesDDL.document: This example shows you how to obtain the table creation DDL.
DescribeCreateTablesDDL.output:
{
    "Response": {
        "CreateTablesDDLs": [
            {
                "DbName": "demo1",
                "TablesDDLs": [
                    {
                        "DDLInfo": "CREATE TABLE `unique_idx_col13` (
  `user_id` LARGEINT NOT NULL COMMENT 'User id',
  `date` DATE NOT NULL COMMENT 'Date and time of data import',
  `city` VARCHAR(20) NULL COMMENT 'User's city',
  `age` SMALLINT NULL COMMENT 'User's age',
  `sex` TINYINT NULL COMMENT 'User's gender',
  `f6_decimal` DECIMAL(10, 6) NULL COMMENT 'DECIMAL column',
  `f7_boolean` BOOLEAN NULL COMMENT 'BOOLEAN column; 0 represents false and 1 represents true.',
  `f8_double` DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'DOUBLE column',
  `f9_float` FLOAT NULL COMMENT 'FLOAT column',
  `f10_string` TEXT NULL COMMENT 'STRING column',
  `last_visit_date` DATETIME NULL COMMENT 'User's last access time',
  `cost` BIGINT NULL COMMENT 'User's total consumption, which is 0 by default.',
  `max_dwell_time` INT NULL COMMENT 'User's maximum stay time, which is 0 by default.'
) ENGINE=OLAP
UNIQUE KEY(`user_id`, `date`, `city`)
DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(`user_id`) BUCKETS 1
PROPERTIES (
"replication_allocation" = "tag.location.default: 1",
"min_load_replica_num" = "-1",
"is_being_synced" = "false",
"storage_medium" = "hdd",
"storage_format" = "V2",
"inverted_index_storage_format" = "V1",
"enable_unique_key_merge_on_write" = "true",
"light_schema_change" = "true",
"disable_auto_compaction" = "false",
"enable_single_replica_compaction" = "false",
"group_commit_interval_ms" = "10000",
"group_commit_data_bytes" = "134217728",
"enable_mow_light_delete" = "false"
);",
                        "TableName": "unique_idx_col13"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "DbName": "demo2",
                "TablesDDLs": [
                    {
                        "DDLInfo": "CREATE TABLE `duplicate_list_partition` (
  `user_id` LARGEINT NOT NULL COMMENT 'User ID',
  `date` DATE NOT NULL COMMENT 'Date and time of data import',
  `city` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'User's city',
  `age` SMALLINT NULL COMMENT 'User's age',
  `sex` TINYINT NULL COMMENT 'User's gender',
  `f6_decimal` DECIMAL(10, 6) NULL COMMENT 'DECIMAL column',
  `f7_boolean` BOOLEAN NULL COMMENT 'BOOLEAN column; 0 represents false and 1 represents true.',
  `f8_double` DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'DOUBLE column',
  `f9_float` FLOAT NULL COMMENT 'FLOAT column',
  `f10_string` TEXT NULL COMMENT 'STRING column',
  `last_visit_date` DATETIME NULL COMMENT 'User's last access time',
  `cost` BIGINT NULL COMMENT 'User's total consumption, which is 0 by default.',
  `max_dwell_time` INT NULL COMMENT 'User's maximum stay time, which is 0 by default.'
) ENGINE=OLAP
DUPLICATE KEY(`user_id`, `date`, `city`)
PARTITION BY LIST(`city`)
